name: Jade Chamber
title: Stargazing Amidst Clouds
desc: "They say that it contains a thousand dazzling jewels."

attributes.source: Reward for accepting Bu'yun's Adventure Challenge in the open world and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Roll Phase: 2 initial Elemental Dice will be of the same Elemental type as your active character.
When Action Phase begins: If you have no more than 3 cards in your Hand, discard this card and create 1 Omni Element.
